list.expr: group by (container, alertname) (ALERTS{namespace="$namespace", container=~".+", tier="", alertstate="firing"})
list.name: Alerts

panels.description: The average per-second number of record sends that resulted in errors for a topic
panels.title: Send Errors Rate  [$period]

panels.description: The average per-second number of retried record sends for a topic
panels.title: Send Retries Rate  [$period]

panels.description: The current number of active connections.
panels.title: Active Connections [$period]

panels.description: The total number of new connections established
panels.title: Created Connections [$period]

panels.description: The total number of connections closed
panels.title: Closed Connections [$period]

panels.description: The fraction of time the I/O thread spent doing I/O
panels.title: IO ratio [$period]

panels.description: The fraction of time the I/O thread spent waiting
panels.title: IO Wait Ratio [$period]

panels.description: The average length of time for I/O per select call in nanoseconds.
panels.title: IO Time [$period]

panels.description: The average length of time the I/O thread spent waiting for a socket ready for reads or writes in nanoseconds.
panels.title: IO Wait Time [$period]

panels.description: The number of bytes read off all sockets per second
panels.title: Incoming Bytes Rate [$period]

panels.description: The number of outgoing bytes sent to all servers per second
panels.title: Outgoing Bytes Rate [$period]

panels.description: The number of requests sent per second
panels.title: Kafka Node Request Rate [$period]

panels.description: The average size of requests sent.
panels.title: Request Size [$period]

panels.description: The number of requests sent per second
panels.title: Request Rate [$period]

panels.description: The number of responses received per second
panels.title: Response Rate [$period]

panels.description: The number of times the I/O layer checked for new I/O to perform per second
panels.title: Select Rate [$period]

panels.description: The average number of bytes sent per partition per-request.
panels.title: Average Batch Size [$period]

panels.description: The max number of bytes sent per partition per-request.
panels.title: Max Batch Size [$period]

panels.description: The average number of batch splits per second
panels.title: Batch Split Rate [$period]

panels.description: Total time producer has spent in flush in nanoseconds.
panels.title: Flush Time [$period]

panels.description: The average time in ms record batches spent in the send buffer.
panels.title: Average Record Queue Time [$period]

panels.description: The total amount of buffer memory that is not being used (either unallocated or in the free list).
panels.title: Available Buffer Bytes [$period]

panels.description: The maximum amount of buffer memory the client can use (whether or not it is currently used).
panels.title: Buffer Total Bytes [$period]

panels.description: The average per-second number of record sends that are dropped due to buffer exhaustion
panels.title: Buffer Exhausted Rate [$period]

panels.description: The total time in nanoseconds an appender waits for space allocation.
panels.title: Bufferpool Wait Time [$period]

panels.description: The fraction of time an appender waits for space allocation.
panels.title: Bufferpool Wait Ratio [$period]
